mapper.insert:
insert into tb_marketing_evaluate (id,create_time,update_time,create_user,update_user,deleted,area_code,tp_id,place_id,place_name,evaluate_content,evaluate_time,evaluate_type,data_type,keywords,rate,resource_info,data_create_time,data_update_time,source_platform,source_platform_id,evaluate_user) values
(#{item.id},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateTime},#{item.createUser},#{item.updateUser},#{item.deleted},#{item.areaCode},#{item.tpId},#{item.placeId},#{item.placeName},#{item.evaluateContent},#{item.evaluateTime},#{item.evaluateType},#{item.dataType},#{item.keywords},#{item.rate},#{item.resourceInfo},#{item.dataCreateTime},#{item.dataUpdateTime},#{item.sourcePlatform},#{item.sourcePlatformId},#{item.evaluateUser})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tp_id = values(tp_id), place_id = values(place_id), place_name = values(place_name), evaluate_content = values(evaluate_content), evaluate_time = values(evaluate_time), evaluate_type = values(evaluate_type), data_type = values(data_type), keywords = values(keywords), rate = values(rate), resource_info = values(resource_info), data_create_time = values(data_create_time), data_update_time = values(data_update_time), source_platform = values(source_platform), source_platform_id = values(source_platform_id), evaluate_user = values(evaluateUser)
mapper.select: select COUNT(evaluate.id) as evaluateTotal, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(evaluate.id),3)*100 as satisfaction, ROUND(SUM(evaluate.rate)/COUNT(evaluate.id),1) as rate from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate

select CASE WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 0 THEN '好评' WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 1 THEN '中评' WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 2 THEN '差评' ELSE '其他' END as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value, COALESCE (ROUND(COUNT(evaluate.id)/total.totalNum, 3)*100,0) as rate from tb_marketing_evaluate as evaluate
INNER JOIN (select count(evaluate.id) as totalNum from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
) as total ON 1 = 1
GROUP BY evaluate.evaluate_type

select CASE WHEN evaluate.data_type = 1 THEN '景区' WHEN evaluate.data_type = 2 THEN '酒店' ELSE '其他' END as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value, COALESCE (ROUND(COUNT(evaluate.id)/total.totalNum, 3)*100,0) as rate from tb_marketing_evaluate as evaluate
INNER JOIN (select count(evaluate.id) as totalNum from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
) as total ON 1 = 1
GROUP BY evaluate.data_type

select evaluate.keywords as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY evaluate.keywords ORDER BY value DESC

select hotel.name as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY evaluate.place_id ORDER BY value DESC

select hotel.id as id, hotel.name as name, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(evaluate.id),3)*100 as value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY evaluate.place_id ORDER BY value DESC

select id as id, place_id as placeId, place_name as placeName, data_type as dataType, CASE WHEN data_type = 1 THEN '景区' WHEN data_type = 2 THEN '酒店' ELSE '其他' END as dataTypeDesc, evaluate_content as evaluateContent, evaluate_time as evaluateTime, evaluate_type as evaluateType, CASE WHEN evaluate_type = 0 THEN '好评' WHEN evaluate_type = 1 THEN '中评' WHEN evaluate_type = 2 THEN '差评' ELSE '其他' END as evaluateTypeDesc, rate as rate, source_platform as sourcePlatform, source_platform_id as sourcePlatformId, evaluate_user as evaluateUser, create_time as createTime from tb_marketing_evaluate
place_ame LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.placeName}, '%') and
place_id = #{params.placeId} and
evaluate_type = #{params.evaluateType} and
data_type = #{params.dataType} and
equip_status = #{params.equipStatus} and
area_code LIKE CONCAT('${params.areaCode}','%') and
evaluate_time >= #{params.beginTime} and
evaluate_time <= #{params.endTime} and
deleted = 0
ORDER BY evaluate_time DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat}) as time, COUNT(evaluate.id) as count from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
INNER JOIN tb_hotel_info hotel ON hotel.id = evaluate.place_id and hotel.status = #{params.status}
evaluate.evaluate_time like concat(YEAR(now())-1,'%') and evaluate.equip_status = 1 and evaluate.deleted = 0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat})

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat}) as time, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(evaluate.id),3)*100 as count from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
INNER JOIN tb_hotel_info hotel ON hotel.id = evaluate.place_id and hotel.status = #{params.status}
evaluate.evaluate_time like concat(YEAR(now())-1,'%') and evaluate.equip_status = 1 and evaluate.deleted = 0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,#{params.sqlDateFormat})

SELECT evaluate.place_name name, count(evaluate.id) `value` FROM tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY place_name ORDER BY `value` DESC

select evaluate.place_name as name, ROUND(SUM(evaluate.evaluate_type = 0)/COUNT(evaluate.id),3)*100 as value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY evaluate.place_id ORDER BY value DESC

select CASE WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 0 THEN '好评' WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 1 THEN '中评' WHEN evaluate.evaluate_type = 2 THEN '差评' ELSE '其他' END as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value, COALESCE (ROUND(COUNT(evaluate.id)/total.totalNum, 3)*100,0) as rate from tb_marketing_evaluate as evaluate
INNER JOIN (select count(evaluate.id) as totalNum from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
) as total ON 1 = 1
GROUP BY evaluate.evaluate_type

select COUNT(evaluate.id) as evaluateTotal, ROUND(SUM( evaluate.evaluate_type = 0)/COUNT(evaluate.id),3)*100 as satisfaction, ROUND(SUM(evaluate.rate)/COUNT(evaluate.id),1) as rate from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate

select DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d') name, count(evaluate.id) value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
group by DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d') order by evaluate.evaluate_time

select DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d') name, SUM(evaluate.evaluate_type = 0) value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
group by DATE_FORMAT(evaluate.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d') order by evaluate.evaluate_time

select evaluate.keywords as name, COUNT(evaluate.id) as value from tb_marketing_evaluate evaluate
GROUP BY evaluate.keywords
